welcome_message_body: Welcome to Koshigaya, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, traditional festivals, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Koshigaya has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Karayama (からやま)
restaurants.description: Karayama (からやま) is a japanese restaurant located in さいたま市.
restaurants.address: 緑区美園4-5-13, さいたま市, 埼玉県, 336-0967

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main international terminal at Haneda Airport, serving various airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Haneda Airport, serving domestic flights within Japan.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection every 3 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Yokota AFB Airport serves both civilian and military flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is primarily used for military flights and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may require a password for access.
